choices.question: The best corpus to train a custom NMT system is...
answers:
a balance of quantity, quality, and relevance of in-domain vs generic content

a pure in-domain corpus, nothing else matters

the biggest available one, nothing else matters

choices.question: In-domain corpora are...
answers:
Parallel sentences whose sentences belong to a particular field of knowledge

Lists of frequent vocabulary and their translations in a particular domain, e.g. law

Parallel texts from a website domain, e.g. www.graefem.com

choices.question: Noisy corpora are...
answers:
Bad to train NMT systems: neural models learn everything and are very sensitive to noise

Good to train NMT systems: noise will be dismissed by artificial intelligence and more diversity will help the system make decisions​​​​​​

​​​​​Neither good nor bad: they make no harm, don’t waste your time cleaning

overallFeedback.feedback: You can do it better, keep trying!
